merge

public static <E> E[] merge(E[] array1,
                            E[] array2,
                            E[] arrayToMerge)
Merges tow array on a other specified array.

E.g.:

String[] a = new String[] {"aa", "bb"}; String[] b = new String[] {"11", "22"}; String[] c = merge(a, b, new String[a.length + b.length]);

The array c : {"aa", "bb", "11", "22"}

Type Parameters:
E - type of elements in array.
Parameters:
array1 - array 1
array2 - array 2
arrayToMerge - array to merge.
Returns:
array merged.

mergeSorting

public static <E> E[] mergeSorting(E[] array1,
                                   E[] array2,
                                   E[] arrayToMerge,
                                   java.util.Comparator<E> comparator)
Executes the merge of tow array on a other array based on specified comparator implementation.

Parameters:
array1 - array 1
array2 - array 2
arrayToMerge - array to merge
comparator - comparator to sort
Returns:
array merged.
